search_results.query: How to go from New York to Montreal

snippet.title: 2014 Stanley Cup Playoffs: Your Guide to Everything You Need to Know
snippet.description: The Stanley Cup playoffs are here at long last—they open Wednesday with three games—and that means the long, seemingly never-ending 82-game season has come to a close...

snippet.title: 2014 NHL Mock Draft: Post-Lottery First-Round Projections
snippet.description: The NHL draft lottery is complete, and NHL teams know where they will select in this year's first round. Each NHL draft year is unique, and this season has several candidates for top spot...

snippet.title: Dave Lozo's Bag Skate: Marc-Andre Fleury's Career Arrives at a Crossroads
snippet.description: Soak in Marc-Andre Fleury while you can during the Stanley Cup playoffs, because it may be the final time you get to see him as a Pittsburgh Penguin...

snippet.title: Chad Johnson Will Not Be Able to Parlay CFL Deal into NFL Return
snippet.description: Chad Johnson will once again play professional football, but it will not be in the United States. In all likelihood, he will never play in the NFL again...
